article.title: General Dynamics Canada Awarded $341 Million Support Contract for Canadian Army Communications System
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: General Dynamics Canada has been awarded a long-term support contract for the Canadian Army's Land Command Support System, ensuring troops will continue to have access to advanced communications services. Initially valued at $341 million, the competitively tendered five-year contract includes options to extend the support annually for up to five additional years, bringing the total potential contract value to $682 million.
